name: Ava (itch) (Albert Valo, Maneo_01, MrSaxCat)
description:
10 chips from The Organization have been lost.
Help Ava to get them back!

Are you up for this challenge?

Ava is a Metroidvania game made with Godot, for the Metroidvania Jam Month 9.

Exploration is key:

  • Find all the chips!
  • Unlock skills to explore the levels!

Thanks for playing the game and please leave us a comment with your feedback!

Consider following us on twitter

  • @AlbertValo - Main Programmer and Composer
  • @MrSilverSteam  - Level Design and Background Artist
  • @Maneo_O - Character Design and Animation
